sentences.en: I'd be happy to surrender Mr. Soprano.
sentences.cn: 我很乐意把索波诺先生供出去?
她成了一名专业的女中音歌手。

sentences.en: She has a natural, clear soprano voice.
sentences.cn: 她有自然 、 清亮的女高音嗓音.

sentences.en: She has sung soprano in many major operas.
sentences.cn: 她在很多大型歌剧中唱过女高音.

sentences.en: She possesses a soprano voice of unusually fine quality.
sentences.cn: 她有着音质特别好的女高音歌喉.

sentences.en: She sings in an exceptionally pure soprano.
sentences.cn: 她以异常纯美的高音歌唱.

sentences.en: The audience applauded after the soprano sang the aria so beautifully.
sentences.cn: 女高音将咏叹调唱得十分优美,观众爆发出热烈的掌声.

sentences.en: The four parts in singing are soprano, alto, tenor and bass.
sentences.cn: 唱歌的四个声部是女高音 、 女低音 、 男高音和男低音.

sentences.en: The soprano began to sing amidst acclamations of the audience.
sentences.cn: 女高音歌手在四座欢呼声中开始演唱.

sentences.en: The soprano was a chunky girl from California.
sentences.cn: 女高音歌手是个来自加利福尼亚的壮硕姑娘。

sentences.en: The soprano's voice sounded clear and sweet.
sentences.cn: 那女高音歌手的嗓音响亮而动听.

sentences.en: The young soprano was taken up by a famous conductor.
sentences.cn: 那年轻的女高音歌手受到一着名指挥家的提携.

sentences.en: This young soprano debuts next month at the metropolitan opera.
sentences.cn: 这位年轻的女高音歌唱家下个月将在纽约大都会歌剧院举行首演.

sentences.en: We had no idea you had such a beautiful soprano voice!
sentences.cn: 我们不知道你竟有一副这么美妙的女高音嗓子!

trans.tran_en: a soprano voice or instrument has the highest range of notes

trans.tran_cn: 女高音，女高音歌手，唱最高音者，高音部
trans.tran_en: a very high singing voice belonging to a woman or a boy, or a singer with a voice like this
